solution_line_template: The {big_toenails_filled} big toenails take up as much space as {space_taken_by_big_toenails_in_regular_units} regular toenails because {big_toenails_filled} x {big_toe_size_multiplier} = <<{big_toenails_filled}*{big_toe_size_multiplier}={space_taken_by_big_toenails_in_regular_units}>>{space_taken_by_big_toenails_in_regular_units}

She has filled up {total_space_filled_in_regular_units} toenails worth because {regular_toenails_filled} + {space_taken_by_big_toenails_in_regular_units} = <<{regular_toenails_filled}+{space_taken_by_big_toenails_in_regular_units}={total_space_filled_in_regular_units}>>{total_space_filled_in_regular_units}

She can fit {remaining_capacity_regular_toenails} regular toenails in the jar because {jar_capacity_regular_toenails} - {total_space_filled_in_regular_units} = <<{jar_capacity_regular_toenails}-{total_space_filled_in_regular_units}={remaining_capacity_regular_toenails}>>{remaining_capacity_regular_toenails}
